Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom.
We greatly appreciate your concern of maintaining the confidentiality of your invention. Please be assured that upon placing your order, LegalZoom agreed to maintain the confidentiality of the information shared for the purpose of your patent order. In order to provide additional peace of mind, attached is a copy of a signed Non-Disclosure and Confidentiality Agreement to support that LegalZoom will not share your information. Please print and/or save the attachment for your records.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
